QuestData.Title: Thieves to the Core
QuestData.Description: You and that Chen fellow are good people, helpin' out with the virmen like you are. I don't like to ask for favors, but I ain't gonna turn 'em away, either.$b$bWhile you're out there puttin' the hurt to those rabbit-men, you wouldn't mind keepin' an eye out for some bags o' hops, would ya? I'm pretty sure they lifted 'em last night.$b$bProbably usin' em for pillows, knowin' how they are.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover 6 Stolen Sacks of Hops from the Twisted Warren.
QuestData.CompletionText: I done told those virmen to stay off my land.
QuestData.RewardText: Aww, thank ya kindly, $gsir:ma'am;. You're a real $ggentleman:sweetheart;.
